辜振甫.definition: Koo Chen-fu (1917-2005), Taiwanese businessman and diplomat

辜負.definition: to fail to live up (to expectations); unworthy (of trust); to let down; to betray (hopes); to disappoint

辜鴻銘.definition: Ku Hung-ming or Gu Hongming (1857-1928), Malaysian writer known for his English-language works and defense of Qing dynasty monarchy
